channel.title: Comments for Furme

item.title: Comment on #3855 Single Seat Rocking Recliner by Krishna priya
item.dc:creator: Krishna priya
item.description: Thank you Furme for my lazy sofa. Very good service. Thank you again.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you Furme for my lazy sofa.
Very good service. Thank you again.

item.title: Comment on #4052 Recliner easy chair wooden – Pure Teak Wood by Santhosh

item.description: Super teakwood. Worth for money. Add something more on this like magazine and glass holder
item.content:encoded: Super teakwood. Worth for money. Add something more on this like magazine and glass holder

item.title: Comment on #3722 Single Seater Recliner by Lalu

item.description: Idu adipoli sadam anu. But you don't tell me that you had also rocking recliner. Can I exchange this?
